rukus.text: 74|1|Ej comaʙarsarkasida
74|2|Barxez va ʙim deh
74|3|Va Parvardigoratro ʙuzurg sumor
74|4|Va comaro pokiza ʙidor
74|5|Va az palidi duri kun
74|6|Baroi in ʙazlu ʙaxsis makun, ki afzuntalaʙi kuni
74|7|Va ʙaroi [xusnudii] Parvardigorat sikeʙo ʙos
74|8|Pas, hangome ki dar «sur» damida savad
74|9|On ruz ruzi saxt [va dusvore] ast
74|10|Bar kofiron oson nest
74|11|[Ej pajomʙar] Maro ʙo kase, ki uro tanho [va ʙiduni amvolu avlod] ofaridaam, voguzor
74|12|[Hamon kase, ki] moli farovone ʙarojas qaror dodam
74|13|Va farzandone, ki hamesa [dar xidmati u va] ʙo u hastand
74|14|Va hamai vasoil [va imkonoti] zindagiro dar ixtijoras qaror dodam
74|15|Boz [ham] tama' dorad, ki [ʙar on] ʙiafzojam
74|16|Hargiz [cunin naxohad sud]! Be gumon, u nisʙat ʙa ojoti Mo dusmani dorad
74|17|Va ʙa zudi uro ʙa masaqqatu saxti meandozam
74|18|Zero u [ʙaroi muʙoriza ʙo Qur'on] andesid va muhosiʙa kard
74|19|Pas, marg ʙar u ʙod! Ci guna andoza [va muhosiʙa] kard
74|20|Boz [ham] marg ʙar u ʙod! Ci guna andoza [va muhosiʙa] kard
74|21|Sipas nazar afkand
74|22|On goh cehra dar ham kasid va ru turs kard
74|23|Sipas [ʙa haq] pust namud va takaʙʙur varzid
74|24|On goh guft: «In [Qur'on] cize cuz codue, ki [az digaron] omuxta suda, nest
74|25|Va in [cize] cuz guftori ʙasar nest»
74|26|Ba zudi uro ʙa duzax darxoham ovard
74|27|Va tu ci doni, ki duzax ci guna ast
74|28|[Otasi suzonest, ki] Na [cizero] ʙoqi meguzorad va na [cizero] raho mekunad
74|29|Pustro [digargun karda] mesuzonad
74|30|Bar on [otas] nuzdah [farista] gumorida sudaast

74|31|Mo ma'muroni duzaxro faqat az faristagon qaror dodem va sumori onhoro tanho ʙaroi ozmoisi kofiron muajjan kardaem, to ahli kitoʙ jaqin kunand va kasone, ki imon ovardaand, ʙar imoni xud ʙijafzojand va ahli kitoʙ va mu'minon giriftori sakku tardid nasavand va to kasone, ki dar dilhojason maraz ast va [niz] kofiron ʙigujand: «Alloh taolo az in masal [va tavsif] ci xostaast?». Bad-in guna, Alloh taolo har kasro ʙixohad, gumroh mesozad va har kasro ʙixohad, hidojat mekunad va [sumori] laskarijoni Parvardigoratro [kase] cuz U namedonad va in cuz pandu andarze ʙaroi insonho nest
